mapper.sql: eposdet.packing_order_summary_det_id, ecqo.option1, epos.contract_code, epos.purchase_req_order_code, IFNULL(eposdet.despatch_batch,'') AS despatch_batch, eposdet.carton_code, epro.material_code, IFNULL(eposdet.location_num,'') AS location_num, eposdet.dominant_term_code, eposdet.device_code, eposdet.putaway_qty, IFNULL(bs.storage_code,'default') AS storage_code, ecqo.remark, IFNULL(epo.arrival_time,NOW()) AS inner_time, IFNULL(epo.arrival_time,NOW()) AS inner_sure_time, wijod.create_time AS record_time, wijod.create_user_id AS record_user
mapper.select:
select FROM wms_inner_job_order_det wijod JOIN eng_packing_order_summary_det eposdet ON wijod.source_det_id=eposdet.packing_order_summary_det_id LEFT JOIN eng_packing_order_summary epos ON eposdet.packing_order_summary_id=epos.packing_order_summary_id LEFT JOIN eng_packing_order epo ON epos.packing_order_id=epo.packing_order_id LEFT JOIN base_material bm ON eposdet.material_id=bm.material_id LEFT JOIN eng_purchase_req_order epro ON epos.purchase_req_order_code=epro.purchase_req_order_code AND bm.material_code=epro.material_code LEFT JOIN eng_contract_qty_order ecqo ON epro.option3=ecqo.option3 LEFT JOIN base_storage bs ON eposdet.putaway_storage_id=bs.storage_id
and wijod.job_order_id = #{jobOrderId}
